description: Found behind a column at the upper ground area.

name: Golden Rune (9) D
description: Found on a big chapel with statues, where there's also a knight that performs the same moveset as Crucible Knight Ordivis, on a body , near the left exit.

name: Golden Rune (9) D
description: Found on a body that two dogs are devouring.

name: Golden Rune [10] (Guardian's Garrison)
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse on the ledge past some barrels near the entrance to Guardian's Garrison.

name: Golden Rune [10] - 3x Castle Sol
description: Rune Consumable. One found on a grave to the south as soon as you enter the main gate. Beware as there is a sleeping Lion Guardian right next to it. A second one is found on a corpse sitting by the northwest corner of the wall, in the upper level. Access via ladder in a building nearby. One more is found on a corpse in the northeast section, on top of a building north of the Church.

name: Golden Rune [12] - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Consumable Item. Looted from a corpse on the third floor, by the lever that opens the boss door.

name: Golden Rune [1] (A) - x1 Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: Over a big stone, where some bats are nesting. Defeat them to loot the body.

name: Golden Rune [1] B
description: Found on the ground East of Church of Vows.

name: Golden Rune [2] (A)
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse along the road.

name: Golden Rune [2] (C)
description: Looted off a corpse at the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Golden Rune [2] (D)
description: Can be looted off of defeated Rats within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Golden Rune [2] (E)-x1 Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description:
Consumable. Pillage the remains in the middle of

Dragon-Burnt Ruins

name: Golden Rune [2] - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse partially hanging on a ledge at the top level of the castle. Beware the harpies nearby.

name: Golden Rune [6] (A)
description: Consumable item. Dropped by an elite singing Bat enemy found along the cliffs south of the Minor Erdtree. You can hear the bat singing as you approach the cliffs. He is guarded by other Giant Bats.

name: Golden Rune [9] - 1x Castle Sol
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse in the middle level of the eastern section of the castle. Accessible via ladder outside the church's main entrance.

name: Golden Seed
description: Found right next to the road in western Altus Plateau.

name: Golden Seed (A)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. One can be found on the ground next to a glowing sapling.

name: Golden Seed (B)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Two can be found under the Phantom Tree in the northwestern outer wall section.

name: Golden Seed (C)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. 2 can be found underneath the Phantom Tree at the Capital Outskirts.

name: Golden Seed (D)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found next to a glowing leafless tree in the northeastern section of the castle, behind the courtyard. A Troll guards the large steps further to the north.

name: Golden Seed (E)
description: Flask Upgrade. Found right in front of the entrance to Fort Haight.

name: Golden Seed (F)
description: Golden Seeds allow the user to upgrade the number of Crimson and Cerulean Flask Uses, but not the amount of Wondrous Physik flasks available.

name: Golden Seed (G)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. One can be found on the ground next to a glowing sapling.

name: Golden Seed (H)
description: Flask Upgrade material. Found under a Phantom Tree in the manor's upper level.

name: Golden Seed (I)
description: Found just south of where Poison Pods are located. Found besides a glowing tree.

name: Golden Seed (J)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree as you exit the narrow channel north of Seethewater River.

name: Golden Seed (J)
description: 1 can be found on the ground, next to the glowing sapling. West of the academy's courtyard.

name: Golden Seed (K)
description: Flask upgrade material. Found along the main road, while heading to the Bestial Sanctum

name: Golden Seed (L)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree at the top of the large stairs in the northern section of town.

name: Golden Seed (M)
description: Found under a golden tree by the side of the road.

name: Golden Seed (N)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree in the lower valley northeast of the Minor Erdtree.

name: Golden Seed (O)
description: Found before a massive frozen giant.

name: Golden Seed - x1 Fringefolk Hero's Grave
description: This item is obtained after Defeating the Ulcerated Tree Sprit located within Fringefolk Hero's Grave.

name: Golden Seed - x2 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: The first one is found by the by defeating the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit NW of the Avenue Balcony Site of grace. The second one is found on a balcony to the SW of West Capital Rampart site of grace.

name: Golden Tailoring Tools
description: Tools made of gold brought with the red-haired Radagon when he married into the Carian line. Located inside a chest at the right of Church of Vows' main entrance.

name: Golden Vow
description: Incantation. Found on a corpse inside the Corpse-Stench Shack.

name: Golem Greatbow
description: Dropped by Golem Archer.

name: Gowry
description: Quest NPC. A once great Sage living in isolation. Found inside his shack near Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

name: Gowry's Shack
description: A lone shack found below the eastern hills near Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

name: Grace Mimic
description: Consumable. Given as a reward by a non-hostile Commoner NPC sitting on the roof of a building. Use the ladder nearby to reach him.

name: Grace Mimic (A)
description: Looted off a corpse at the northwest of the graveyard. The body is next to a gravestone, sitting by the ledge.

name: Grace Mimic (B)
description: Found on a dead body on the way.

name: Grafted Blade Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Dropped by Leonine Misbegotten upon defeat.

name: Grafted Scion
description: Optional Miniboss. Patrols the main hall of his fortress. No special drops.

name: Grafted Scion
description: A Grafted Scion can be found at the destroyed camp across the stone pillar, at the bottom of the cliffs.

name: Grafted Scion (Tutorial)
description: Boss fought within the tutorial stage at Chapel of Anticipation.

name: Grand Lift of Dectus
description: Site of Grace found on the Liurnia side of the Grand Lift of Dectus.

name: Grand Lift of Dectus
description: A massive lift that connects the Altus Plateau to Liurnia. Requires collection of both Dectus Medallion (Left) and Dectus Medallion (Right) to activate.

name: Grand Lift of Rold
description: Elevator connecting Lyndell and Mountaintop of the Giants. Can also be used to access Consecrated Grounds, by those who have obtained the Haligtree Medallion pieces.

name: Grand Lift of Rold (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace, located at the side of the Grand Lift of Rold

name: Grave Glovewort
description: Grave Gloveworth (1) can be found at the end of the tunnel.

name: Grave Glovewort (1)
description: To the Right before the second fire column, climb the ladder. On the left, you can find it.

name: Grave Glovewort (1)
description: Grave Glovewort (1) is in the in-between level of Stormfoot Catacombs. Once you reach the top, fall from the second arch to reach it. In the vicinity you will notice the Glovewort.

name: Grave Glovewort (1) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found inside the Spiritcaller's Cave, in the long cavern before the boss arena.

name: Grave Glovewort (1) F
description: Multiple found inside Murkwater Cave.

name: Grave Glovewort (2)
description: Found inside the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (2)
description: Can be found inside the Cliffbottom Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (2)
description: Can be found inside the Road's End Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (3)
description: Found inside the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (3)
description: Can be found inside the Cliffbottom Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (3) a
description: Inside the Road's End Catacombs. Past the first few Enemies, down the stairs, there are three Grave Glovewort (3).

name: Grave Glovewort (3) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found inside the Spiritcaller's Cave, in the long cavern before the boss arena.

name: Grave Glovewort (3) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in a hallway in the caverns under the elevator in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4)
description: Found inside the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4) A
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Unsightly Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Wyndham Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in a hallway in the caverns under the elevator in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (5) A
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Unsightly Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (5) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Wyndham Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (5) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. 2 in total. First is found in a room on the floor that the elevator goes down to. Another is found on an upper ledge in a room beneath the elevator shaft with water that inflicts scarlet rot.

name: Grave Glovewort (a)
description: Grave Glovewort 1 found after taking a left turn and heading downstairs, turn back at the base of the stairs to grab it. Beware of the rising Skeletons. Inside the Deathtouched Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (b)
description: Grave Glovewort 1 found inside Deathtouched Catacombs. Just in front of the other one, after heading down the stairs, turn to the right and you will find it on your left side.

name: Grave Glovewort (c)
description: Can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. The Grave Glovewort (1) is located in the big hall with Skeletons both in the lower and upper level.

name: Grave Glovewort (d)
description: Found inside Deathtouched Catacombs. After unlocking the lever at the end of the dungeon, in the newly opened room, you will find the Grave Glovewort (1).

name: Grave Glovewort [7] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found by a set of steps opposite the first Lesser Burial Watchdog encountered.

name: Grave Glovewort [8] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found in the large hall locked behind an Imp Statue barrier. This is directly above the flamethrower pillar and there is a hole in the ground where a section of the pillar can rise through.

name: Grave Glovewort [8] - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade material. One is found in the first room with a frost trap.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One is found in a room behind the first Lesser Burial Watchdog encountered, taking the short steps down.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - 6x Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade material. 6 in total. First is found within the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, in a room filled with imps. Another one is found in the room before taking the stairs to the second floor of the frost trap. Third is on second floor by the trap. A fourth is guarded by two Cleanrot Knights in a room in the second floor by the trap. A fifth one can be looted on the third floor by the lever to open the boss door. Final one is in a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog.

name: Grave Gloveworth (e)
description: Grave Glovewort 1 found inside Deathtouched Catacombs. After using the lever, head to the new room, it is in the upper level, where the Skeleton Archers await you.

name: Grave Violet
description: Found at the graves.

name: Grave Warden Duelist
description: Found within Murkwater Catacombs.

name: Gravel Stone
description: Crafting Material. Two obtained by a grave marker overlooking the cliffs. Guarded by a Pumpkin Head.

name: Gravel Stone (C)
description: Found at the end of a dark alley.

name: Gravel Stone B
description: Crafting Material, found in the middle of the lake. Before of the lurking Dragons in the area.

name: Gravel Stone D - x5 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Going down the elevator behind the big hall after the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths Site of Grace, there's an area filled with Wormfaces. At the end, far east at the edge of the last corner, there's x5 Gravel Stone.

name: Gravel Stone E - x3 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: On the side of the hallway part on a dead body near the corner.

name: Graven-School Talisman
description: Found up the ladder close to the Debate Hall Site of Grace and then down the hole to another the room with potboys.

name: Gravity Stone Chunk
description: Found inside a chest in a small cabin. The chest is next to where you are teleported to upon using the trap coffer at Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Gravity Stone Fan
description: Offensive Consumable Item. Found on a corpse by the cliffs.

name: Gravity Stone Fan (Caelid)
description: Found inside a chest in a small cabin. The chest is next to where you are teleported to upon using the trap coffer at Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Gravity Well
description: Dropped by the Monolith Guardian enemy that appears from a gravity portal. The section is near the graveyard and the large rotating lift of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Great Club
description: Hammer Weapon. Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll boss inside the Old Altus Tunnel upon defeat.

name: Great Dragonfly Head
description: On a corpse underwater at the Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Great Epee
description: Head southeast from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, head to the top of a cliff and you'll see a statue of an object that looks like the half piece of a bowl or a circle. Face the other way, and get down, you will find a group of enemies. The Great Epee is inside a chest. on the right side.

name: Great Grave Glovewort - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by the boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, Putrid Grave Warden Duelist.

name: Great Horned Tragoth
description: Assassination target for the Volcano Manor. You can invade their world using a summoning sign after accepting the assassination request.

name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
description: Dropped by the Omenkiller at Volcano Manor

name: Great Rune of the Unborn
description: Great Rune of Rennala, Queen of the Moon. Acquired as a reward for defeating the supreme sorceress.

name: Great Turtle Shell
description: Small Shield. Found on a corpse atop the eastern-most tower of the Castle Morne Ramparts. This area can be reached by using Torrent to jump from the Spiritspring located just east of the Site of Grace nearby.

name: Greataxe
description: Found inside the treasure chest within the carriage being pulled by two large Trolls and defended by militia and aristocracy.

name: Greatblade Phalanx
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Bols, Carian Knight inside the Cuckoo's Evergaol.

name: Greatshield Talisman
description: Found in a chest on a Wagon East of Grace "Erdtree-Gazing Hill" behind Ancient Dragon Lansseax.

name: Green Turtle Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in an underground area filled with Turtles. The entrance is found slightly south-east of Summonwater Village and requires 1 Stonesword Key to unlock.

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood.

name: Groveside Cave
description: Site of Grace found inside the Groveside Cave, right before the boss fight.

name: Groveside Cave
description: Small cave north from Church of Elleh.

name: Guardian Golem
description: Found within the Highroad Cave. Drops Blue Dancer Charm

name: Guardian's Garrison
description: A garrison of Fire Priests guard the path to the Giant Forge.

name: Guilty Hood
description: Found at the right side of the sewe-like tunnel.

name: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman
description: A non-hostile NPC found within the Bestial Sanctum. Awards various items for handing in Deathroot.

name: Haligdrake Talisman
description: Between fallen columns, there is a small entrance. Enter and take the path until you fing a hanging body.There you will find the Haligdrake Talisman

name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)
description: Key Item. Found in the castle's northeast tower after defeating Commander Niall.

name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)
description: Key Item. Hit Albus, who is disguised as a pot past the Perfumer guarding the path up from the Village of the Albinaurics Site of Grace. This medallion opens the path to a secret location past Lyndell.

name: Hammer
description: Found inside the Fortified manor, beside the Sanctified Whetblade

name: Hammer Talisman
description: Enhances stamina-reducing attacks against blockers.

name: Hand Ballista
description: At the top of the Forest Lookout Tower, west of the Bridge of Sacrifice.

name: Hawk Crest Wooden Shield
description: Medium Shield. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Heart of Aeonia
description: Site of grace in the heart of the Aeonia Swamp

name: Hefty Beast Bone x4
description: Found on a body on the walkway up in the castle area, to the right when exiting the first room after the ladder up.

name: Heretical Rise
description: Puzzle tower that hides xx. Unlock the entrance by finding the invisible bridge from the other side of the ravine, and carefully follow the misty path to find the way to enter.

name: Hermit Village
description: A secluded village found southeast of the volcano.

name: Hermit's Shack
description: A small shack found south of the volcano.

name: Hero's Rune (1)
description: Found inside Fortified Manor, at the second room.

name: Hero's Rune (1) A
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse inside the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Hero's Rune (2)
description: On a body against a wall, beware of the soldier and the lion guarding it.

name: Hero's Rune (2) B
description: On the corner next to the stair there's a corpse a little bit hidden by a bunch of debris.

name: Hero's Rune (5)
description: Found inside the big room with the statues and the knight that can perform the same moves as Crucible Knight Ordovis, on a body.

name: Hidden Path to the Haligtree
description: Catacombs leading from the Grand Lift of Rold to Consecrated Grounds. Can only be accessed by those who have found both pieces of the Haligtree Secret Medallion

name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
description: Light Helmet. Found on a corpse behind a house in the southern side of the village.

name: Highland Axe
description: Axe. Found in the same hall as the Grafted Scion miniboss, under a large painting.

name: Highroad Cave
description: A cave that houses a tomb, deep within. It is situated at the northmost part of Limgrave. It has been inhabited by a pack of Wolves, Land Octopuses, and Giant Bats.

name: Highroad Cave Site
description: Site of grace, located inside the entrance of Highroad Cave.

name: Highway Lookout Tower
description: Tower overlooking the highway of Liurnia's eastern landmass.

name: Highwayman Hood
description: Dropped by a Bandit at the Murkwater Cave

name: Holy Grease
description: Over The main road, at the top of the wrecked chariot.

name: Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Holyproof Dried Liver
description: On the sewers, past the Broken Statue, on the room below there are three items to grab, one of those is this one.

name: Hookclaws
description: Claw weapon. Found on a corpse in the corner of a small corridor on the first level of the wine cellar, filled with crates and patrolled by a single Castle Guard.

name: Hyetta (4th location)
description: Hyetta moves here if you have given her shabiri grapes at her previous locations.

name: Hyetta (First Location)
description: Hyetta, Location 1. Hyetta roams The Lands Between in search of the distant light, drawn to her destiny by a guiding shine she feels in the back of her eyes when eating Shabriri grapes.

name: Hyetta (Second Location)
description: Hyetta, Location 2. She is found at the western side of the Purified Ruins. She asks for another Shabriri Grape but does not give any reward this time.

name: Hyetta (Third Location)
description: Hyetta spawns near the site of grace. She will ask for another Shabriri Grape and will ask what the grapes really are. Telling her will make her puke and then thank you for telling her. After sitting down at the grace nearby she will have more dialog. After once again sitting at the grace she will move to her next location.

name: Ice Crest Shield
description: Small Shield. Found on a corpse up on a ledge by a jagged stone pillar. This area is behind the gardens.

name: Icerind Hatchet
description: Axe found inside a chest in the Temple Quarter. The chest is located inside a ruined building.

name: Icon Shield
description: Found inside a crumbling building. Beware of the enemies inside.

name: Imbued Sword Key A
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate at The Four Belfries. Found in a chest at the very top of the hill, at the fourth belfry tower.

name: Imbued Sword Key B
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate. It can be looted off a corpse found on the east side of the Raya Lucaria Academy rooftops.

name: Imbued Sword Key C
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate at The Four Belfries. Found in a chest in the northeast section of town. This location is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

name: Immunizing Cured Meat
description: Found in the small group of Poison Flowers in the outskirts of the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Immunizing White Cured Meat
description: Temporarily boosts immunity.

name: Imp Head (Cat)
description: Helm. Found on a corpse inside the Impaler's Catacombs.

name: Imp Head (Elder)
description: Found as a treasure inside Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. In a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog.

name: Impaler's Catacombs
description: Mini-dungeon. The entrance can be found by following the cliffside on the eastern edge of Weeping Peninsula.

name: Impaler's Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found within the Impaler's Catacombs, near the entrance.

name: Impassable Greatbridge
description: A heavily guarded great bridge that leads to the Redmane Castle of Caelid.

name: Inquisitor Ghiza
description: NPC Invader. Appears at the far end of the dining room when going up to the upper floor of Volcano Manor.

name: Inquisitor's Girandole
description: Spear. Dropped by the Abductor Virgins.

name: Invigorating Cured Meat A
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse on the eastern side of the ruins.

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat
description: Found in the middle of the Woodfolk Ruins

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat (2)
description: Found on a body in the middle of the bridge.

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat (C)
description: Found at the bottom of a tree.

name: Irina
description: NPC found sitting on a rock at the beginning of the main road in eastern Weeping Peninsula. Hands you Irina's Letter and asks that you deliver it to her father at Castle Morne in the south.

name: Iron Cleaver
description: Dropped by one of the enemies that can be found at behind the big door, on the right side.

name: Iron Cleaver - CASTLE MORNE
description: Dropped by one of the Misbegotten creatures attacking a soldier before reaching the top of Castle Morne.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (First Location)
description: Alexander, a huge cauldron with arms and legs, is stuck on the ground and needs help.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Second Location)
description: Found inside Gael Tunnel After talking to him, he sets of to Redmane Castle

name: Iron Whetblade
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Isolated Merchant
description: General Goods vendor found sitting in his shack. Sells the Lantern and Lost Ashes of War, among other useful items.

name: Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow
description: General Goods vendor found sitting outside his shack in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Dragonbarrow)
description: Secluded hut found in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Dragonbarrow)
description: Site of Grace found inside the Isolated Merchant's Shack.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Site of Grace outside the Isolated Merchant's Shack.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Weeping Peninsula)
description: A wooden hut far to the west of the Weeping Peninsula.

name: Ivory Sickle
description: Can be found at the Village of the Albinaurics.It is up a small hill, behind some small houses.

name: Jar Cannon
description: Ballista. Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Margot when defeated.

name: Jarwight Puppet
description: Spirit Ashes. Can be bought from a body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
description: Light Helmet. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Robe and 1x Larval Tear.

name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
description: Light Chest Armor. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Cap and 1x Larval Tear.

name: Kaiden Helm
description: Dropped by a sword-wielding knight.

name: Kaiden Sellsword Ashes
description: Found within Cliffbottom Catacombs. Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog.

name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
description: Drops from the Crystallized Crab that can be found by a corner on the west side of the academy's courtyard.

name: Katar
description: Looted from a treasure chest in Fort Gael. You can find the chest inside a dark room on the elevated platform above the Lion Guardian.

name: Kenneth Haight (First Location)
description: Kenneth Haight is first encountered at this spot. He is seen dramatically calling out for someone to aid him in his plight.

name: Kenneth Haight (Second Location)
description: Kenneth Haight will move to this location after you clear our Fort Haight. He can be found up on the battlements where you fought the Beast Crest Heater Knight.

name: Kindred of Rot
description: Optional Boss. Found by falling through holes to reach the lowest floor of Seethewater Cave.

name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Kindred of Rot.

name: Kingsrealm Ruins
description: A large set of ruins found in northwest Liurnia.

name: Knight Bernahl
description: Tarnished Knight NPC found at the Warmaster's Shack. Sells various Ashes of War.

name: Kukri
description: Looted off a corpse behind the Glintstone Dragon Smarag.

name: Lake-Facing Cliffs
description: Site of grace facing the vast lake

name: Lance Talisman
description: Found at the north of Limgrave past the main road close to the edge.

name: Land Octopus Ovary
description: Defeat Land Octopus to obtain.

name: Land Octopus Ovary B
description: Crafting Material, found against the wall, on a small campsite where two Ghost Jellyfish dwell.

name: Large Glintstone Scrap
description: Accessed from Limgrave Tunnels. Underground. It can be found on a body, inside a little hut guarded by dogs.

name: Large Glintstone Scrap - X2 MORNE TUNNEL
description: Two can be looted off a corpse behind the small shack in Morne Tunnel.

name: Larval Tear (A)
description: Key Item. Can be found at the graveyard in the Village of Albinaurics, near the town well.

name: Larval Tear (B)
description: Key Item. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Cap and Juvenile Scholar Robe.

name: Laskyar Ruins
description: Ruins found in the marshes south of the lake.

name: Laskyar Ruins Waygate
description: A Waygate that transports the user to the Raya Lucaria Academy's main entrance. Found in a gazebo in the center of the Laskyar Ruins.

name: Leaden Hardtear
description: Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit

name: Leather-Draped Tabard
description: Dropped by a Leyndell Solder at Leyndell Royal Capital. You can find him past the first Leyndell Guard, turn right until you see the second Leyndell Guard. On your right, you will see a soldier on his knees, kill him to obtain this item

name: Lenne's Rise
description: Tower located at the eastern part of Caelid.

name: Lenne's Rise. (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace at the entrance of Lenne's Rise

name: Leonine Misbegotten
description: Optional Greater Enemy Boss. Can be found by heading southeast from the "Beside the Rampart Gaol" Site of Grace, through the wooden bridge and down a ladder onto the shores below. Drops the Grafted Blade Greatsword upon defeat.

name: Letter from Volcano Manor
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining your mission after pledging your services to the Volcano Manor. Found in a room unlocked using the Drawing-Room Key.

name: Letter to Bernahl
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining Bernahl's mission. Given by Bernahl after completing two quests for the Volcano Manor.

name: Letter to Patches
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining Patches' mission. Given by Patches after completing two quests for the Volcano Manor.

name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
description: Dropped by a Leyndell Knight

name: Leyndell Knight Helm
description: May drop from Leyndell Knights

name: Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Lhutel the Headless
description: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade inside the Tombsward Catacombs

name: Liftside Chamber
description: Site of Grace by the northern lift.

name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
description: Found in the room sealed by an Imp statue, requires a Stonesword Key to access.

name: Lightning Strike
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the lower section of the crevasse. When approaching from either the eastern or western cliffs, look for stone platforms jutting out of the cliffside to safely descend to the area. Beware as the area is constantly being pummeled by lightning and there are several Giant bats guarding the scarab as well.

name: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver
description: Can be found on a body that is being devoured by enemies

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver A
description: On a dead body at one side of the main way guarded by Gnolls

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver B
description: Found on the third body on the staircase in the main road.

name: Limgrave Tower Bridge
description: Site of Grace found near the eastern bridge.

name: Limgrave Tunnels
description: On the northern area of the Agheel Lake, you can find the rich Limgrave Tunnels

name: Limgrave Tunnels
description: Limgrave Tunnels Site of Grace, located just below the main elevator.

name: Lion Guardian
description: Optional Miniboss. Found hiding in the bushes near the eastern bridge entrance. No special drops. Can be skipped if you stick to the north as you pass by.

name: Lionel's Armor
description: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace along the rest of the set

name: Lionel's Gauntlets
description: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace along the rest of the set.

name: Lionel's Greaves
description: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace along the rest of the set.

name: Lionel's Helm
description: Inside a church-like building, to the left side, alongside the rest of the set.

name: Liurnia Highway North
description: Site of Grace found on the side of the road.

name: Liurnia Highway South
description: Site of Grace on the side of the road.

name: Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Site of Grace found on the southern landmass, by the Nomadic Merchant.

name: Liurnia Tower Bridge
description: Site of Grace accessed by taking the lift down in the middle of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.

name: Lone Wolf Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Given by Renna. Return to the church after getting your horse from to find Renna sitting by the ruins.

name: Longtail Cat Talisman
description: Looted off a corpse that can be found at the bottom section of the large rotating lift. Past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy, simply ride the lift down and defeat the single Pendulum Statue enemy.

name: Lord Contender's Evergaol
description: Evergaol with Boss Fight: Roundtable Knight Vyke, who drops the Fingerprint Set.

name: Lord's Rune
description: Drops from the Erdtree Avatar that patrols the road.

name: Lordsworn's Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Found inside a Wagon Chest.

name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
description: Straight Sword. Dropped by Noble soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins.

name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword (B)
description: Dropped by a head-less, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.

name: Loretta's Greatbow
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta upon defeat.

name: Lost Ashes of War
description: Key Item used to duplicate Ashes of War. Found by the locked gate in the northwestern Capital Outskirts.

name: Lost Ashes of War
description: Found at the bottom of the sewers.

name: Lower Capital Church
description: Site of grace inside the Capital Church

name: Lucidity
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.

name: Lump of Flesh
description: can be looted from a corpse by the beachside near the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace in south of Limgrave. The corpse is being guarded by a Giant Crab.

name: Lump of Flesh
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse on the field.

name: Lusat's Glintstone Staff
description: Glintstone Staff. Found in a chest in the building north of the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest bosses' chamber after defeating them.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head (Caelem Ruins)
description: Duo Boss Fight against two Mad Pumpkin Heads. They are found in an underground room, the entrance to which is in the eastern side of the ruins. No drops but allows access to a treasure room upon defeat.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head (Waypoint Ruins)
description: Field Boss. Found directly below the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes
description: Spirit Summon Ash. Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog duo bosses within the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Magic Grease
description: Consumable. 2 found on a corpse on a lower ledge reachable by dropping down.

name: Magic Grease (B)
description: Found in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going underneath the raising floor in the spiked room.

name: Magic Grease (C)
description: Consumable, found at the corridor past the elevator, on a body to the righ side wall.

name: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Magma Shot
description: Sorcery. Rewarded by Tanith after completing the first letter quest.

name: Magma Whip Candlestick
description: Whip. Rewarded by Patches after completing his Volcano Manor quest.

name: Magma Wyrm
description: Optional Boss, found inside Gael Tunnel. Drops x1 Dragon Heart and Moonveil

name: Magma Wyrm Makar
description: This Boss fight is accessed through Ruin-Strewn Precipice, upon reaching the Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook Site of Grace.

name: Magma Wyrm Site of Grace
description: Site of Grace for Magma Wyrm

name: Magma Wyrm's Scalesword
description: Curved Greatsword dropped by Magma Wyrm Makar

name: Main Academy Gate
description: Site of grace at the main entrance to Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Main Caria Manor Gate
description: Site of Grace found by the southern gate to Caria Manor. Be careful when traversing the fields outside the manor, as a rain of energy projectiles will constantly bombard you until you reach this Site of Grace.

name: Malefactor's Evergaol
description: Evergaol found on the southern landmass of Liurnia. The boss Adan, Thief of Fire is imprisoned within.

name: Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan
description: Non-Invader Hostile NPC. Found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle. Drops Antspur Rapier, Marais Mask and Marais Robe upon defeat.

name: Manor Lower Level
description: Site of Grace found in a chapel building on the west side of the estate.

name: Manor Towershield
description: Can be found near the Liftside Chamber Site of Grace. It's accessed by scaling along the edge outside.

name: Manor Upper Level
description: Site of Grace found in a room in the east. Accessible by using the garden walkways from the chapel building in the west and then taking a lift up a tower.

name: Map (Caelid)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the rest of the Caelid region. Found on a monolith at the Caelid Highway South intersection.

name: Map (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Map for all of Consecrated Snowfield: follow the road north past the snowstorm until you go down and cross a frozen river, then you will spot the map pillar ahead.

name: Map (Dragonbarrow)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the Dragonbarrow region. Found on a monolith along the road east of the Dragonbarrow West Site of Grace.

name: Map (Leyndell, Royal Capital)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the Leyndell region. Found on a monolith near the Outer Wall Phantom Tree Site of Grace.

name: Map (Limgrave, East)
description: At the foot of a pillar with ancient writings on it. Unlocks Eastern Limgrave on your map.

name: Map (Limgrave, West)
description: At the foot of a pillar. Unlocks Western Limgrave on your map

name: Map (Liurnia, East)
description: It's in the middle of the swampy lake, by a monument that has highlightened texts over it.

name: Map (Liurnia, West)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals western Liurnia. Found on a monolith along the road by a junction.

name: Map (Mountaintops of The Giants, East)
description: Found at the altar. You can arrive by walking on the chain from the enemy encampment.

name: Map (Mt. Gelmir)
description: Map of Mt. Gelmir region

name: Map (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Map for all of Weeping Peninsula. Found

name: Map Mountaintops of the Giants, West
description: As you leave the Grand Lift of Rold, take the path forward until tou reach a stone monument on your right, interact with it to obtain the map Fragment.

name: Map: Liurnia, North
description: Can be found over a grave-like big stone, at Academy Gate Town,

name: Marais Executioner's Sword
description: Dropped by Elemer of the Briar

name: Marais Mask
description: Light Helm. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Marais Robe
description: Light Chest Armor. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Margit, the Fell Omen
description: A large, apparently elder creature, self-proclaimed as "The last of all kings". Drops Talisman Pouch and 12000 Runes upon defeat.

name: Margit, the Fell Omen Site
description: Margit the Fell Omen Site of Grace, located at the boss arena of Margit, near Stormvel Castle.

name: Marika's Soreseal
description: Talisman. Found on an altar in a room requiring a Stonesword Key in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. From the Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace, leave the area through the eastern door and head down the ladder to the south-east. After going through the arch, turn right and follow the path, circling the city until you get to the imp statue.

name: Marionette Soldier Armor
description: Chance for it to drop from a Marionette Soldier enemy just outside of Witchbane Ruins

name: Marred Leather Shield
description: Shield. Found on a corpse on a wooden platform, outside the castle walls.

name: Mask of Confidence
description: Helm. Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.

name: Mausoleum Compound
description: Site of Grace found between broken statues

name: Meeting Place Map
description: Can be found at the entrace of the Raya Lucarian academy, on lying corpse.

name: Melted Mushroom
description: Can be found just past the Site of Grace, to the left side.

name: Memory Stone (A)
description: Memory Upgrade Material. Found in a chest at the top floor of Oridys's Rise.

name: Memory Stone (B)
description: Memory Upgrade Material. Found in a chest on the top floor of the Converted Tower.

name: Memory Stone (C)
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Found in a chest at the top floor of Testu's Rise.

name: Memory Stone (D)
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Found on the top floor of Seluvis's Rise.

name: Memory Stone (E)
description: x1 rewarded as a drop upon defeating Red Wolf of Radagon.

name: Memory Stone (F)
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Maggie upon defeat.

name: Merchant Kalé
description: General Goods Vendor. Found sitting by the fire in the ruins of the Church of Elleh. Sells the Telescope and Crafting Kit key items.

name: Meteoric Ore Blade
description: Katana. Found inside a chest in a small room at the back of an underground hall filled with sarcophagi and Prawn Miners enemies. The entrance is found in the northwest section of the ruins.

name: Meteorite
description: Sorcery. Dropped by the Alabaster Lord upon defeat.

name: Meteorite Staff
description: Glintstone Staff with S scaling but no upgrades. Found on a corpse hanging from a window in Street of Sages Ruins in the swamp of Caelid.

name: Millicent
description: Millicent can be found in the Church of the Plague slumped against a wall.

name: Mimic's Veil
description: Reusable Key Item. Found in a chest inside the assembly room with the large war table. There is a Banished Knight in this room.

name: Minor Erdtree
description: A withered Minor Erdtree found in northern Mt. Gelmir.

name: Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the Altus Plateau

name: Minor Erdtree (Caelid)
description: Erdtree of Caelid found in the northwest, near the border to Limgrave.

name: Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast)
description: Minor Erdtree in the Northeast part of the Liurnia of the Lakes region.

name: Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Southwest)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the plateaus in the southwest of Liurnia.

name: Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East)
description: Minor Erdtree found on the eastern half of the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
description: Optional Dungeon found behind the Erdtree, in the north.

name: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found within the Minor Erdtree Catacombs, a few steps from the entrance.

name: Minor Erdtree Church
description: Found outside the west gate to Leyndell Capital City surrounding a Minor Erdtree..

name: Minor Erdtree Church
description: The Site of Grace is right in front of the Erdtree.

name: Miranda Powder
description: Once you are back inside, roll onto the blocked door, and loot this on your left. You will get x10 Miranda Powder.

name: Miranda the Blighted Bloom
description: Miranda the Blighted Bloom is a large, poisonous flower within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Miriel, Pastor of Vows
description: Miriel is the steward of Church of Vows.

name: Misbegotten Shortbow
description: There are flying enemies at the top of the castle. Thet may drop this weapon when killed.

name: Misericorde
description: Dagger. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Missionary's Cookbook (3)
description: Cookbook item. Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

name: Mistwood Outskirts
description: Site of Grace situated next to the main road North of Mistwood Ruins, in the middle of a group of large stones.

name: Mistwood Ruins
description: An old ruin occupied by a Lesser Runebear. The site is home to a few prized Trina's Lilies.

name: Moongrum, Carian Knight
description: Moongrum, Carian Knight. The last line of denfense before reaching Rennala's arena. Drops the Carian Knight's Shield upon defeating the hostile NPC.

name: Moonlight Altar
description: Site of Grace located in South-West Liurnia of The Lakes.

name: Moonveil
description: Katana. Dropped by Magma Wyrm inside Gael Tunnel.

name: Morgott's Great Rune
description: Drops from Morgot, The Omen King

name: Morgott, The Omen King
description: Main Boss. Drops Remembrance of the Omen King and Morgott's Great Rune upon defeat.

name: Morne Moangrave
description: Site of Grace accessible after defeating the Leonine Misbegotten boss.

name: Morne Tunnel
description: Morne Tunnel can be found in Weeping Peninsula. To reach it jump down towards the bottom of the canyon next to Ailing Village in Weeping Peninsula.

name: Morne Tunnel Site
description: Located at Underground Level 1 of Morne Tunnel.

name: Morning Star
description: Hammer-type Weapon. Found in a chest inside a broken wagon along the road.

name: Murkwater Catacombs
description: Following the Murkwater, you can find the Murkwater Catacombs.

name: Murkwater Cave
description: Found halfway over the Murkwater River.

name: Murkwater Coast
description: Site of grace located at the coasts of Murkwater

name: Murkwaver Cave (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace just inside Murkwater Cave

name: Mushroom Set
description: Armor Set. Found in a room filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.

name: Nascent Butterfly
description: An exceedingly rare butterfly to find, can be found west on the edge of the mountain near the Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite Site of Grace.

name: Nascent Butterfly (D)
description: Found on a body over the stairs.

name: Nascent Butterfly A
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse in a room filled with skeletal slimes in the northwest section of the castle, by a ladder.

name: Nepheli Loux (First Location)
description: Nepheli Loux Location 1. A fellow Tarnished warrior NPC found in a small room near the north of the castle. The entrance to this room is behind the courtyard, along the path leading up to the huge steps guarded by a Troll.

name: Neutralizing Boluses
description: Found on a body on the walls of The Shaded Castle.

name: Night Comet
description: Sorcery spell. Found in a chest in the central section of town. This location is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

name: Night's Cavalry (Caelid)
description: Night's Cavalry Miniboss. Roams the Caelid Highway South. Only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight upon defeat.

name: Night's Cavalry (Limgrave)
description: Night's Cavalry roams the bridge near Agheel Lake North, only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Repeating Thrust

name: Night's Cavalry (Liurnia)
description: Night's Cavalry Miniboss found patrolling near the Gate Town Bridge. Only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Ice Spear

name: Night's Cavalry (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Night's Cavalry Miniboss found patrolling the roads around the Castle Morne Ramparts. Only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Barricade Shield

name: Nightrider Flail
description: Dropped by Night's Cavalry.

name: Nightrider Glaive
description: Halberd dropped by Night's Cavalry

name: Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite
description: Site of Grace

name: Noble Sorcerer Ashes
description: Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog

name: Nokron, Eternal City Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate at The Four Belfries that transports you to Nokron, Eternal City. Requires an Imbued Sword Key.

name: Nomadic Merchant Caelid Highway North
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire east of the Astray from Caelid Highway North Site of Grace.

name: Nomadic Merchant Caelid South
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire in south Caelid. Sells the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (15), among other items.

name: Nomadic Merchant Castle Morne Rampart
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire near the Castle Morne Rampart site of grace. Sells Stonesword Key

name: Nomadic Merchant East Limgrave
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire next to the road between Mistwood Ruins and Fort Haight.

name: Nomadic Merchant Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Found by a campfire on the west road after passing through the outpost to the northwest of Church of Irith, before entering the forest in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Nomadic Merchant Mountaintops East
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found south of Stargazer's Ruins, beneath the cliffs.

name: Nomadic Merchant Mt. Gelmir
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire on a ledge halfway up Mt. Gelmir. Sells Stonesword Key and a full set of Confessor armor.

name: Nomadic Merchant North Limgrave
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found playing music by a campfire east of the bridge connecting Stormhill and East Limgrave.

name: Nomadic Merchant North Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Merchant NPC located next to the river, just pass the Bellum Church's hole in order to find him.

name: Nomadic Merchant West Limgrave
description: General Goods vendor found southeast of the Coastal Cave entrance along the beach, sitting by a fire under a collapsed stone structure.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (12)
description: Cookbook item found inside the Rose Church, by the southern walls.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (14)
description: Cookbook item. Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (23)
description: On a corpse lying by the road soon after the first Site of Grace of the area.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (6)
description: Cookbook item. Can be looted from the chest in the room at the top of the main stairs of Fort Haight.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (7)
description: It can be taken from a dead man sitting at the edge of the collapsed bridge.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [4]
description: Cookbook item. Obtained in the south of Mistwood. Found on a corpse at the side of the road close to the Siofra River Well.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [8]
description: Can be found on a corpse within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [9]
description: Cookbook item. Found inside the Tombsward Catacombs, locked behind an imp statue barrier. Requires a Stonesword Key to break the seal.

name: Northern Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Site of Grace found by the road leading to north Liurnia.

name: Nox Flowing Sword
description: Curved Sword. Dropped by the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest bosses upon defeat.

name: Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest
description: Duo Boss fight. The entrance to their chamber is initially sealed by a barrier which can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the northwest section of town. Drops Nox Flowing Sword upon defeat.

name: Okina Mask
description: Dropped by NPC Invader Bloody Finger Okina alongside his trusted katana, Rivers of Blood

name: Old Altus Tunnel
description: Optional Dungeon. An old mining site rich with crystals. The Stonedigger Troll boss can be found at the end.

name: Old Altus Tunnel
description: Site of Grace found within the Old Altus Tunnel. Found after descending the lift at the entrance.

name: Old Fang
description: Crafting Material. 2 are found on a corpse hidden within a huge clutch of Poison Pods under a fallen structure.

name: Old Fang B
description: Found on a body that's being devoured by two dogs.

name: Old Fang C
description: By the bones where the Gnolls are roaming around.

name: Old Fang D
description: Dropped at Castle Morne by one of the Misbegotten enemies, past the caged spirit.

name: Old Knight Istvan
description: Assassination target for the Volcano Manor. You can invade their world using a summoning sign after accepting the assassination request.

name: Old Lord's Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest in Crumbling Farum Azula. When you get on the large crumbling bridge, instead of going up to the boss, go the opposite way down to a building. Navigate through it and take the ladder down to a bridge connecting to the tower housing the chest.

name: olden Centipede A - Siofra River
description: Located close after the first lift entrance, just after descending into the well. It will be on the corner atop a pile of rubble and rocks.

name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
description: Looted from a corpse on a narrow path that leads back to the Schoolhouse Classroom site of Raya Lucaria Academy. You need to pass through the illusory wall and jump over the balcony on the left, and circle back to the said site of grace. To find the illusory wall, go to the hallway from the schoolhouse classroom site, turn left. The illusory wall is in front of the corpse inside the room.

name: Omen Cleaver
description: Curved Greatsword. Dropped by the Omen enemy in the northwest section of the courtyard. It is advised to take out all of the lesser enemies nearby before taking on the ogre.

name: Omenkiller
description: Field Boss.Found at the Village of the Albinaurics. Drops Crucible Knot Talisman

name: Omenkiller (Volcano Manor)
description: Field Boss.Found at Volcano Manor. Drops Great Omenkiller Cleaver

name: Omenkiller Rollo
description: Dropped by Fell Twins

name: Omensmirk Mask
description: Dropped by man wielding double swords (Omensmirk) and wearing mas outside of Lower Capital Church site.

name: One-Eyed Shield
description: Shield. Dropped by mini-boss NPC Chief Guardian Arghanthy inside Guardian's Garrison.

name: Onyx Lord
description: Enemy. Found in the Sealed Tunnel blocking the path to the Divine Tower of West Altus.

name: Onyx Lord's Greatsword
description: Curved Greatsword. Dropped by the Onyx Lord when defeated.

name: Opaline Bubbletear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

name: Ordovis's Greatsword
description: Drops by Crucible Knight Ordovis

name: Oridys's Rise
description: Lookout Tower. Initially sealed by a barrier. Inspecting the statue at the entrance, you are asked to "seek three wise beasts". These can be found as Ghostly Tortoises that you need to attack. The first is just a few steps directly to the north, opposite the entrance. There is another one hiding in the bushes left of the steps leading up to the tower. The last one is found in a pond slightly west of the tower and is invisible until struck. Attack near the center of the pond to reveal the Tortoise. Once all three have been defeated, the tower's seal is broken.

name: Ornamental Straight Sword
description: Straight Sword. Dropped by the Grafted Scion upon defeat.

name: Outer Wall Battleground
description: Site of Grace found near the northwestern gate of the outer walls.

name: Outer Wall Phantom Tree
description: Site of Grace found next to the Phantom Tree on the outskirts of Leyndell.

name: Page Hood - TOMBSWARD RUINS
description: Chance to drop from a Page enemy at Tombsward Ruins underground cellar.

name: Page Trousers
description: Dropped by an assassin inside  the room located below the balcony stairs.

name: Palm Reader (Academy Bridge)
description: Palm Reader. Can be found at the edge of the broken bridge that leads to the Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Palm Reader (Collapsed Bridge)
description: She is sitting on at table at the start of the collapsed bridge.

name: Palm Reader (Grand Lift of Rold)
description: Palm Reader found at the base of the Grand Lift of Rold.

name: Partisan A
description: Spear. Dropped by the Head Guard Elite enemy patrolling the central area of the Gatefront Ruins. This item is dropped along with Godrick Knight Greaves.

name: Partisan B
description: A Partisan Spear that can be dropped from a Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.

name: Patches
description: Found within Murkwater Cave. After defeating him, he sets up a shop in the Cave.

name: Patches
description: Appears by the Volcano Manor's entrance after pledging your service to the manor.

name: Patches (Merchant)
description: Location of Patches if forgiven during the Bossfight.

name: Pearldrake Talisman +1
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found in an underground room near the top of the ruins. The entrance requires a

name: Perfume Bottle
description: Found on a body at the edge of the top part of the ramparts, a large Poison Skeleton can be found on the wooden bridge underneath.

name: Perfume Bottle (B)
description: Found inside a chest., on the second flor.

name: Perfume Bottle (C)
description: Found guarded by normal enemy Leonine Misbegotten on the east side of the eastern pond.

name: Perfumer Gloves
description: Dropped by the royal assassin that's kneeling.

name: Perfumer Tricia
description: Optional Duo Boss Fight. Perfumer Tricia is found at the end of the Unsightly Catacombs and is accompanied by a Misbegotten Warrior.

name: Perfumer's Cookbook (2)
description: Found a body on the chair looking over the edge of the walls in the northern part of The Shaded Castle.

name: Pickled Turtle Neck (A)
description: Consumable. Found in a chest inside Earthbore Cave, a short distance from the Site of Grace.

name: Pickled Turtle Neck (B) x1 - Castle Morne
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse in a small room with a caged ghost. Beware of the Skeletal Slime that drops from the ceiling when you collect this.

name: Pidia, Carian Servant
description: Pidia is a Merchant. Can be found by falling down from the cliff at Three Sisters.

name: Pike
description: Can be looted off a corpse that's lying on the heavily guarded courtyard. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace

name: Poison Armament
description: Incantation. Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming around the northeast section of Aeonia Swamp. Figure out its pattern via the footprints and wait for the prints to approach and then attack.

name: Poison Grease (A)
description: Consumable Item. 2x found on a corpse under a dead tree in the eastern section of town.

name: Poison Mist
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the forested area.

name: Poisonbloom
description: Crafting Material. 4x found on a corpse sitting at the end of the cliffs.

name: Poisonbone Dart
description: Found on a body in the middle of the poisoned area in the east side of the wall

name: Poisonbone Dart (A)
description: An offensive consumable that can be found on a corpse inside Tombsward Cave.

name: Poisonbone Dart - x8 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: On a small corridor, against the fence (Sewers)

name: Prattling Pate (Apologies)
description: Reusable Item. Found on a corpse in the Unsightly Catacombs, along the corridors in the room with the lever that opens the final door.

name: Prattling Pate (Thank You)
description: Reusable Item. Obtained inside the Tombsward Catacombs. Found on a corpse at the end of the main path, past the flamethrowing pillar.

name: Prattling Pate (You're Beatiful)
description: Reusable Item. Found on a corpse on the side of a hide on the south side of the village.

name: Preceptor's Set
description: Armor Set. Found on a body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Preserving Boluses
description: Consumable Item. Five can be found inside the Shack of the Rotting.

name: Preserving Boluses (B)
description: Inside the next room, after you get down the lift. Beware of the lurking enemies.

name: Primal Glintstone Blade
description: Talisman. Found in an underground area of the Stargazer's Ruins. The entrance is sealed by a barrier and there is a talking jellyfish atop the steps. Summon the Spirit Jellyfish next to her to unlock the seal.

name: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
description: Site of Grace

name: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
description: Mysterious NPC. Hands you the Comet Azur spell after interacting with them.

name: Prince of Death's Pustule
description: Looted off a corpse that can be found at the pit of the castle's crypt. The body can be found next to a giant face that is structured from roots. It is guarded by a Root Monster, players will need to defeat the guardian to reach the spot.

name: Prophecy Painting
description: Info Item. Found by inspecting the large painting inside a building in the northwest section of the main courtyard.

name: Pumpkin Helm - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Helm. Dropped by the Pumpkin Head enemy at the left side of the back of Castle Morne's main courtyard.

name: Pumpkin Helm B
description: Headgear. Dropped by Pumpkin Head

name: Purified Ruins
description: The holy remains now lie in ruins to the side of the main road.

name: Purified Ruins Waygate
description: Leads to the entrance of the Academy

name: Putrid Grave Warden Duelist
description: Boss of the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. Drops Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak and Great Grave Glovewort

name: Queen's Bedchamber
description: Site of grace

name: Radagon Icon
description: Found inside a treasure chest on the second floor of the Debate Hall Site of Grace. From the gate entrance leading to the courtyard, make a hard right and jump over the fence. Climb up the ladder and head through the broken glass window. The treasure chest is on the east section.

name: Radagon's Scarseal
description: Dropped by Ancient Hero of Zamor

name: Radagon's Soreseal
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse by dropping down the opening on the roof and looking around the wooden walkways.

name: Radahn's Great Rune
description: Dropped by Starscourge Radahn

name: Rainbow Stone (A)
description: Can be found at the top of the broken structure.

name: Rainbow Stone (B)
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse among some sacks and wooden objects.

name: Rampart Tower
description: Site of grace located at the Rampart Tower of the Stormveil Castle.

name: Rampartside Path
description: Site of grace found at the western side of Leyndell.

name: Rancorcall
description: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab that can be found at the underground crypt of the castle.

name: Ranni the Witch
description: Found atop Ranni's Rise. Speak to her on your first visit to begin her questline.

name: Ranni's Rise
description: One of three towers found in the Three Sisters sub-region. Three Sisters is accessible after completing Caria Manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Ranni's Rise
description: Site of Grace found in Ranni's Rise. Up on the first floor.

name: Ravine-Veiled Village
description: Ravine-Veiled Village Site of Grace, right below the entrance to the Miners' cave that lead to Ruin-Strewn Precipice.

name: Raya Lucaria Academy
description: The second Legacy Dungeon of the game, Raya Lucaria hides multiple riches, particularly for those interested in magic.

name: Raya Lucaria Academy Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate located past the Iron ball trap.

name: Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Optional Mini Dungeon. The entrance is found on the northeastern cliff face of the lake.

name: Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Site of Grace found inside the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. It is found after descending the lift.

name: Raya Lucaria Grand Library
description: Site of Grace at the main library in Raya Lucata Academy.

name: Raya Lucaria Soldier Ashes
description: Found inside a chest at the end of Road's End Catacombs. Have to hit the final wall, to dispell it and be able to move on. Beware of the many Jade Goblins at the final room.

name: Rear Gael Tunnel Entrance
description: Site of Grace found by the rear entrance to Gael Tunnel.

name: Recusant Finger
description: Multiplayer Item. Found in a locked room with the Letter from Volcano Manor after pledging your services to the Volcano Manor.

name: Recusant Henricus
description: Hostile invader equipping a maze and wearing full body armor.

name: Red Branch Shortbow
description: Drops from an Assassin on the study, past the Trumpeteer

name: Red Letter
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining your final mission after pledging your services to the Volcano Manor. Found in a room unlocked using the Drawing-Room Key.

name: Red Wolf of Radagon
description: A huge, highly agile, magical Red Wolf that guards the Debate Hall of Raya Lucaria Academy. Drops a Memory Stone and 14000 Runes.

name: Redmane Castle
description: Redmane Castle is where you begin the Starscourge Radahn Boss Fight before transporting to Wailing Dunes.

name: Redmane Painting
description: Key Info Item. Found as a large painting under some rubble near the center of town.

name: Reduvia
description: Dropped by Bloody Finger Nerijus

name: Rejuvenating Boluses
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse by jumping on a trap to access a higher area of the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs.

name: Rejuvenating Boluses (B)
description: At the center of the lake where there are Lesser Wormface sitting around. Reach this area by going down the elevator behind the big hall that is next to the Tempest-Facing Balcony grace.

name: Remembrance of the Fire Giant
description: Drops from Fire Giant upon defeat.

name: Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen
description: Remembrance of Rennala, Queen of the Moon. Acquired as a reward for defeating the supreme sorceress. To be given to Enia to draw out the power within.

name: Remembrance of the Omen King
description: Drops from Morgot, The Omen King

name: Remembrance of the Starscourge
description: Dropped Starscourge Radahn

name: Renna
description: Renna appears in the Church of Elleh after you get your horse from Melina. Gives the Spirit Calling Bell and Lone Wolf Ashes.

name: Renna's Rise
description: One of three towers found in the Three Sisters sub-region. Three Sisters is accessible after completing Caria Manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Renna's Rise Waygate
description: Waygate. Found at the top of Renna's Rise. Teleports you to Ainsel River Main.

name: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon
description: One of the demigods. She can be fought at the top of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Revenger's Shack
description: A small, secluded shack located north of the Minor Erdtree. Beware of invader Edgar the Revenger.

name: Revenger's Shack
description: Site of Grace found by the Revenger's Shack. Interacting with this for the first time will cause Edgar the Revenger to invade the player.

name: Rileigh the Idle
description: Assassination target for the Volcano Manor. You can invade their world using a summoning sign after accepting the assassination request.

name: Ringleader's Evergaol
description: Evergaol located at the west of Liurnia of the Lakes. You can fight Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader

name: Ritual Pot
description: Special Tool Key Item. Found on a corpse in the northern section of the Laskyar Ruins, in front of a set of pillars.

name: Ritual Pot (A)
description: Special Tool Key Item. Found inside a treasure chest, at the end of the hallway that is guarded by sorcerers and a giant Living Jar. The nearest site of grace is the Schoolhouse Classroom in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Rivers of Blood
description: Katana dropped by NPC invader Bloody Finger Okina. Spawns near the Church of Repose in the later areas of the game.

name: Road of Iniquity
description: Site of Grace.

name: Road to the Manor
description: Site of Grace found along the main road towards Caria Manor.

name: Road's End Catacombs
description: At the end of narrow path, you can find Road's End Catacombs.

name: Roar Medallion
description: Dropped by Stonedigger Troll. Located in Limgrave Tunnels.

name: Rock Blaster
description: Sorcery spell found inside the Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Found in a chest inside a shed at the top of the main cavern.

name: Roderika
description: In Stormhill Shack there's a Woman with a Red Hood. She is Roderika and has a quest for the player that unlocks Spirit Ash upgrades

name: Roiling Magma
description: Sorcery. Found on a corpse inside the Hermit's Shack.

name: Root Resin
description: Consumable item. 4x Found on a corpse on the first trap room.

name: Rose Church
description: An abandoned church overgrown with bloodroses and rot.

name: Rosus' Axe
description: An Axe found in the room sealed by the Imp Statue in the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Rot Grease
description: Found on a body in the middle of the raised Garden looking area in the middle of The Shaded Castle main keep area where.

name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
description: Leggings dropped by the large rotten duelist enemy guarding the rear of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
description: Chest Armor dropped by the boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs.

name: Rotten Greataxe
description: Colossal Weapon. Dropped by the duelist enemy guarding the rear of Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Rotview Balcony
description: Site of Grace on a cliffside overlooking Caelid.

description: Boss of the Lord Contender's Evergaol, drops the Fingerprint Set.

name: Royal Grave Evergaol

name: Royal House Scroll
description: Head southeast from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, head to the top of a cliff and you'll see a statue of an object that looks like the half piece of a bowl or a circle. Face the other way, to see a Knight. Keep going to a structure to see a man standing watching over the big structure, alongside a dead body. In that body, you will find the Royal House Scroll.

name: Royal Knight Loretta
description: Great Enemy. The guardian of Caria Manor. Drops Loretta's Greatbow and Ash of War: Loretta's Slash upon defeat.

name: Royal Moongazing Grounds
description: Site of Grace found after defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Royal Revenant
description: Optional Boss found in an underground area of the Kingsrealm Ruins. The stairs leading down to the location is hidden by an illusory floor in the northeast section of the ruins. You need to step on the floor to dispel the illusion.

name: Ruin-Strewn Precipice
description: A large precipice over Ravine-Veiled Village with Miners' caves all the way to the top.

name: Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook
description: Site of Grace located on top of Ruin-Strewn Precipice, right before Magma Wyrm Makar Bossfight.

name: Ruined Labyrinth
description: Site of Grace found amongst the ruins and broken statues in the area

name: Rune Arc
description: Found inside the Academy Crystal Cave. Enter the room protected by a Great Sage, open the chest to find the Rune Arc.

name: Rune Arc
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse underground in the Sealed Tunnel.

name: Rune Arc
description: Dropped by Old Knight Istvan after successfully invading his world.

name: Rune Arc
description: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle after successfully invading his world.

name: Rune Arc
description: Dropped by Great Horned Tragoth after successfully invading his world.

name: Rune Arc - 1x Castle Sol
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse by a campfire atop the building in the south of the courtyard. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the path along the outer walls. Rune Arcs are also frequently dropped by Rat enemies in the castle.

name: Rune Arc B
description: After fighting Omenkiller, turn to the right and you will find it at the end of the path, on a body.

name: Rune Arc C
description: Inside Road's End Catacombs there is a hidden room. Hit the second archway wall after heading down the stairs. on your left you will find the Rune Arc

name: Rune Arc D
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse on the upper walkways of the garden. This is accessible from the chapel in the west.

name: Rune Arc E
description: On a body, past the Nomadic Merchant and some big stones, near the edge of the cliff.

name: Rune Arc F
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse inside a large enemy outpost.

name: Rune Arc G
description: Consumable Item. Found inside a chest in the first room on the right.

name: Rune Arc H
description: Looted off a corpse next to the locked gate of Fort Gael.

name: Rune Arc I
description: Consumable item found inside Sellia Crystal Tunnel on a corpse at the end of the wooden walkway, inside the first large cavern ahead of the Site of Grace.

name: Rune Arc J
description: Found on a body on a chair on the outskirts of the Aeonian Swamp in Caelid

name: Rune Arc K
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse inside the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Rune Arc L - 1x Castle Morne
description: Can be looted off a defeated Giant Rat.

name: Rune Arc M
description: Climb the "wing" of the dragon and once you are on top, jump to the room below. you will find one there.

name: Rune Arc N
description: Found inside the Fortified Manor, in the room with the big table in the middle.

name: Runebear
description: Optional Miniboss. Found in the lower level of Earthbore Cave after leaping down into a hole near the end. Drops the upon defeat.

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
description: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar.

name: Rusted Anchor
description: Greataxe dropped by Scaly Misbegotten located in Morne Tunnel.

name: Rusty Key
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse inside the room with the Banished Knight.

name: Rya
description: The scout of Volcano Manor.

name: Sacramental Bud (A)
description: A Sacramental Bud can be found at the edge of the cliffs, red buds on a small white tree.

name: Sacramental Bud (B)
description: 2 small white plants with red Sacramental Buds can be found on a cliff in Mt. Gelmir. On the edge of the cliffside down the ladder from the Nomadic Merchant Mt. Gelmir.

name: Sacramental Bud (C)
description: Found on a body sat on a chair here.

name: Sacramental Bud (D)
description: Many sacramental buds can be found within the Church of the Plague

description: Talisman. Dropped by invader Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater when defeated.

name: Sacred Tear
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Callu Baptismal Church.

name: Sacred Tear
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Church of Pilgrimage.

name: Sacred Tear
description: Allows the user to upgrade the Crimson and Cerulean Flask Potency. Located on the ground in front of the statue in Third Church of Marika.

name: Sacred Tear
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Fourth Church of Marika.

name: Sacred Tear (Church of Ripose)
description: Flask upgrade, found inside the Church of Ripose, below the main statue.

name: Sacred Tear (Church of the Plague)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Church of the Plague.

name: Sacred Tear (First Church of Marika)
description: A flask upgrade found within the First Church of Marika

name: Sacred Tear (Stormcaller Church)
description: Found inside Stormcaller Church

name: Sacred Tear 2
description: Inside Bellum Church, below the big statue.

description: Give the letter to Edgar and he'll give you x1 Sacrificial Twig.

name: Sage Hood
description: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.

name: Sage Leggings
description: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.

name: Sage Robe
description: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.

name: Sainted Hero's Grave
description: South to the Minor Tree. Beware of the Black Knife Assassin

name: Sainted Hero's Grave (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace inside the Sainted Hero's Grave

name: Saintsbridge
description: Site of grace, located just at the tip of the bridge

name: Sanctified Whetblade
description: Found inside the fortified manor, you have to access by jumping through the roof and entering the building.

name: Sanctuary Stone - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Can be found at Castle Morne, dropped when defeating a Lesser Pumpkin Head.

name: Sanguine Noble
description: Invading NPC. Drops Sanguine Set

name: Scaled Set
description: Armor Set. Dropped by Old Knight Istvan after successfully invading his world.

name: Scaly Misbegotten
description: Optional Boss, found within Mourne Tunnel. Drops Rusted Anchor

name: Schoolhouse Classroom Site
description: Site of Grace found in a room at the top section of the large rotating lift.

name: Sealed Tunnel
description: Found at the south end of the river outside the west gate to Leyndell Royal Capital.

name: Sealed Tunnel
description: A few meters inside the Tunnel,

name: Seaside Ruins
description: Site of grace located in the wilderness.

name: Secluded Cell
description: Site of Grace in the northern section of the castle. Found next to a fog gate leading to Godrick the Grafted.

name: Second Church of Marika
description: The Second Church of Marika

name: Seedbed Curse
description: At the big room, before you fight the Bedouins take the stairs all the way up. You will find it on a body that's is sitting on a chair, in the middle of the room.

name: Seedbed Curse - x1 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: Found on a body on the library area.

name: Seethewater Cave
description: A cave locked behind an imp statue. Requires a Stonesword Key to unlock.

name: Seethewater Cave
description: Site of Grace right by the entrance to Seethewater Cave.

name: Seethewater Terminus
description: Site of Grace

description: Site of Grace found behind a sealed door in northern Sellia. Requires lighting the brazier in the southeast of town to unlock.

name: Sellia Crystal Tunnel
description: Short description for xx location

name: Sellia Crystal Tunnel
description: Site of Grace found inside Sellia Crystal Tunnel.

name: Sellia Gateway
description: Gateway leading to Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

description: Site of Grace found west of town, at the bottom of a set of stairs.

description: A once-great town renowned for its study of the sorcerous arts. Now lying in ruin, the ghosts of its former scholars still roam the streets.

description: Quest NPC. Found on the ground floor of his tower after first speaking to his spectral form at Ranni's Rise.

name: Seluvis (Spectral)
description: Quest NPC. Appears in spectral form by the entrance after speaking to Ranni for the first time.

name: Seluvis's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Found on a body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Seluvis's Introduction
description: A scroll given by Seluvis. It is addressed to Sorceress Sellen

name: Seluvis's Potion
description: Key Quest Item. Given by Seluvis after accepting his task.
