name: Sending Gate (Bestial Sanctum)

name: Sending Gate (Sellia Crystal Tunnel)
description: This is a trap chest at an underground cellar in Dragon-Burnt Ruins. It will teleport you to the Sellia Crystal Tunnel in Caelid.

name: Sentry's Torch
description: Sold by Hermit Merchant for 7000 Runes Hard north of reyndell royal capital and west of that minor erdtree, up on the westernmost side of that cliff area west of said tree

name: Serpentbone Blade
description: Katana. Rewarded by Tanith after completing the second letter quest.

name: Sewing Needle
description: Key Quest Item. Dropped by the Demi-Human Chief boss upon defeat. Return it to Boc the Seamster in the Coastal Cave to further his storyline.

name: Shabriri
description: Npc that looks exactly like Bloody Finger Hunter Yura. He tells you about "a righteous path to ascension"

name: Shabriri Grape A
description: Key Item. Found next to a ghostly NPC in the underground section of Godrick's throne room.

name: Shabriri Grape B
description: Can be found downstairs. The path is blocked by debris and barrels. Once downstairs, you can find it on your left.

name: Shabriri's Woe
description: Found on a body at the edge of the Frenzied Flame Village

name: Shack of the Lofty
description: A lone shack found at the base of some cliffs in the north of the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Shack of the Rotting
description: A worn down shack infested with Skeletons.

name: Shaded Castle Ramparts
description: Site of Grace found on top of one part of the Castle Ramparts

name: Shamshir
description: Found inside the Highroad Cave, on a platform after the waterfall section, being feasted on by Giant Bats.

name: Shatter Earth
description: Sorcery. Found on a corpse in the second-to-last level of Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. Inside an opening in the north.

name: Shattering Crystal
description: Looted off a corpse on the second floor, west side, of the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy. The only way to reach this is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops

name: Shield of the Guilty
description: In the cellar area of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins, before the main building with the Demi-Human Queen mini-boss. You will need to jump over a wall to access the stairs leading into the cellar.

name: Silver Mirrorshield
description: Shield found in the Apostate Derelict church.

name: Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot
description: One can be found at the northern side of the broken bridge that leads to Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse surrounded by Eagles.

name: Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot (B)
description: Further in the cemetery, past the Golden Rune (6),

name: Siofra River Well
description: A cylindrical structure that takes players underground to the southern section of the Siofra River.

name: Skeletal Bandit Ashes
description: Spirit Ash that drops from the Tibia Mariner

name: Skeletal Militiaman Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Obtained when defeating the Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village.

name: Sliver of Meat
description: Found on a dead body over the road.

name: Sliver of Meat
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse where a singing Bat is sitting.

name: Smithing Stone

name: Smithing Stone (1)

description: Upgrade Material. Two can be found on a corpse at the Saintsbridge.

description: A Smithing Stone found on top of a corpse that lays on the ground. Found together with 3 other dead bodies and a rounded group of chairs.

name: Smithing Stone (1) B
description: Found together with a Smithing Stone [2] inside a stone statue surrounded by trolls.The creatures can be manipulated into hitting and cracking the sculpture open in order to grab the Stones.

name: Smithing Stone (1) C
description: Found over a hanging body, near one of the structures

name: Smithing Stone (1) D
description: Upgrade Material that can be looted off a corpse. The corpse is resting against a wall.

name: Smithing Stone (1) E
description: Found at Church of Elleh on the smithing table.

name: Smithing Stone (1) E - x1 Highroad Cave
description:
Smithing Stone (1) Upgrade Material can be found within

Highroad Cave

description:
Approximately 8 found in

Limgrave Tunnels

(mostly as yellow glowing stones on wall)

Smithing Stone (2) Upgrade Material can be found within

Highroad Cave

At the balcony of the fortified Manor, next to the room with the swords on the table.
The second can be found inside the fortified Manor, once in the lower level at the back of the armory room.

description: Found on a body in the corner atop the walls.

description: Found on a body, at the little patio.

description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in the lava-filled cavern of the .

description: Take the path to the right after finding the Dragon Temple Site of Grace, it is found on the corner not too far.

name: Smithing Stone (6) B

name: Smithing Stone (6) B

description: Dropped by Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast.

name: Smithing Stone [1]

name: Smithing Stone [2]
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse by the outside of the castle walls. Reachable by climbing on broken sections nearby.

name: Smithing Stone [2]
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on an upper platform where Castle Guards are mounted on ballistae.

name: Smithing Stone [2]

description: Site of Grace directly south of the telescope.

name: Snow Witch Set
description: Armor Set. Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Soft Cotton
description: Found against a wall, surrounded by snails.

name: Soft Cotton - X1 MORNE TUNNEL
description: One can be looted off a corpse in Morne Tunnel.

name: Soft Cotton B
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair south of the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins.

name: Soldier of Godrick
description: Optional Boss. Found within in the Fringefolk Hero's Grave if you jump down the pit into the Tutorial Area.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1) - Church of Dragon Communion
description: Upgrade Material. Obtained by defeating a Teardrop Scarab in the area..

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1) - Limgrave Tunnels
description: Players can find one at the Limgrave Tunnels. Before taking the second elevator, fall down the edge on the left, and keep falling on the surfaces against the wall. There is a Golden Rune (1) on a platform with a dead body, the next one has a Somber Smithing Stone [1].

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1) a
description: Located on the field, on a dead body sitting on a chair.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1) b
description: As a drop when defeating a sphere-shaped enemy at the top of a ruined building.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1) C
description: Dropped by the Lion Guardian

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2)
description: Upgrade Material. 3 can be found Inside a gazebo.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2)
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab near the edge of the cliffs.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2) B
description: Upgrade Material. Found in a chest inside the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2) D
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in a small room close to the Site of Grace in Gael Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) A
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse at the end of a narrow path along the eastern walls.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) B
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair by the shore.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) C
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair overlooking the cliffs.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) D
description: Looted off a corpse behind the altar of the Church of the Cuckoo in the academy.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) E
description: Looted on the monolith. It can be found past the Graveyard section where you'll see a large rotating lift. It is protected by a Monolith Guardian in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) F
description: Dropped by a Teadrop Scarab found within the woods.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4)
description: Located on a body by the burning fire.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) C
description: Looted off a corpse that can be found in a small room with some small crabs. Located at the rooftops section of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) D
description: Upgrade Material. Multiple found inside the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) E
description: Found on a body in the swamp next to a Cleanrot Knight

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) F
description: Upgrade Material. Can be found within Gael Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Taken from a yellow crystal on the walls of the Altus Tunnel

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Upgrade Material. Found standing in a corner of the tunnels in the Sealed Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) B
description: Found on a body by the dead tree on the western end of the outer courtyard of The Shaded Castle

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) C
description: Upgrade Material. Multiple found inside the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (6)
description: Found on a body sat on a chair overlooking the edge, there is a wolf sat next to them.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (7) A
description: Upgrade Material. Found inside a statue with a glowing crack on it. Lure one of the nearby Golems to destroy the statue and collect the item.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (7) B
description: Drops from a Lesser Spider Hand

name: Somber Smithing Stone (7) C - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: At the edge on the tornado side on a small floating platform.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (8)
description: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab found at the top of a small mountain. Will vanish if it spots you or you get too close.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (8) A
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found sitting on a fallen tree in central Dragonbarrow. Warning: This scarab explodes upon death, dealing massive damage!

name: Somber Smithing Stone (8) B
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the lower valley.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9) A
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting in a chair on the bridge south of Stargazer's Ruins.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9) B - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Next to the bridge near the cliff.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9) C - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: On the platform below the Ancient Dragon that can be seen sitting from a distance.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [1] - X3 MORNE TUNNEL
description: You can find a few in Morne Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [2]
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse, fallen with its chair at the beach. Guarded by 4 Spirit Jellyfish.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [8] Consecrated Snowfield
description: Upgrade Material. Defeat a Teardrop Scarab to obtain it.

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (1)
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Fallingstar Beast at the end of the Sellia Crystal Tunnel upon defeat.

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (2)
description: Dropped after defeating the pair of Crystalians found at the end of the Altus Tunnel.

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (3)
description: Key Item. Unlocks Somberstone (5) and (6) upgrade materials sale at the Twinmaiden Husks in the Roundtable Hold. Found in a corpse just outside the First Church of Marika

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (4)
description: Found on a corpsenext to the Tempest-Facing Balcony.

name: Soporific Grease
description: Consumable Item. 3 are found under a fall structure.

name: Soporific Grease (B)
description: 2 Soporific Grease can be found on one of the bodies in the destroyed camp at the bottom of the cliff here across the stone pillar.

name: Soporific Grease C
description: Found lying in the middle of the ground. Beware enemies nearby.

name: Sorcerer Painting
description: Key Info Item. Found inside the central building of the courtyard. This can be accessed through the roof by walking along the top of the northeast walls and finding a walkway connecting to the building.

name: Sorcerer Rogier (First Location)
description: Sorcerer Rogier Location 1. Friendly NPC who sells Ashes of War. Initially met in the Chapel in the western section of the Castle. After you defeat Godrick, he moves to the Roundtable Hold.

name: Sorcerer's Isle
description: Site of Grace found on the eastern edge of the isle.

name: Sorceress Sellen A
description: Found standing behind two illusory walls in a room. But she doesn't respond.

name: Sorceress Sellen B
description: Considered a witch and exiled member of the Raya Lucaria Academy, Sorceress Sellen sells Sorceries.

name: Sorceress Sellen C
description: Sorceress Sellen alternative location.

name: South of the Lookout Tower
description: Site of Grace found directly south of the Forest Lookout Tower.

name: South Raya Lucaria Gate
description: Site of grace at the entrance of the Raya Academy.

name: Spelldrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Acquired by defeating the Runebear boss inside Earthbore Cave.

name: Spiked Club
description: Hammer Weapon. Found on a corpse outside the Hermit's Shack.

name: Spiked Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood.

name: Spiked Spear
description: Chance for it to drop from a Marionette Soldier enemy just outside of Witchbane Ruins.

name: Spirit Calling Bell
description: Key Item. Given by Renna. Return to the church after getting your horse to find her sitting by the ruins.

name: Spirit Jellyfish Ashes - Stormhill Shack
description: Obtained from Roderika form Stormhill Shack while pursuing her questline.

name: Spirit-Caller Snail
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of the Road's End Catacombs. Drops the Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes upon defeat.

name: Spiritcaller's Cave
description: Cave found on the western bank of the frozen lake. Requires two Stonesword Keys to unlock the barrier. Spirit Snails and a double boss await within.

name: Spiritcaller's Cave
description: Site of Grace found within the Spiritcaller's Cave, near the entrance.

name: St Trina's Torch
description: Special Torch. Looted from the treasure chest in the caravan wagon carted in the southern portion of Consecrated Ground in the northern lands.

name: Staff of Loss
description: Glintstone Staff. Found on a corpse leaning over a building's balcony. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Stanching Boluses - X1 MORNE TUNNEL
description: One can be looted off a corpse in Morne Tunnel.

name: Stargazer Heirloom
description: Talisman. Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Stargazer's Ruins
description: A set of ruins found in central Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Starlight Shards A
description: Starlight Shards: Do a Spiritspring Jumping, and keep jumping until you reach the top.You will find the item over a cup-like monument, on the edge.

name: Starlight Shards B
description: Starlight Shards: Found at the very west of Stormhill at the edge of the Cliff on a stone monument.

name: Starlight Shards C
description: Consumable Item. Found in front of a crescent bowl-shaped stone sundial at the edge of the cliffs behind the castle.

name: Starlight Shards D
description: Can be found at the edge in front of the stone statue.

name: Starlight Shards E
description: Can be found in front of the half bowl stone statue by the cliff, overlooking the fog covered Academy Gate Town and Gate Town Bridge,

name: Starlight Shards F
description: Found in front of a crescent bowl-shaped stone statue by the cliffs.

name: Starscourge Heirloom
description: Looted from a chest in Fort Gael. It's outside the watchtower on the upper-section of the fort, under a canopy tent.

name: Starscourge Radahn
description: One of the Shardbearers. Drops Remembrance of the Starscourge, Radahn's Great Rune

name: Starscourge Radahn
description: Site of Grace unlocked after defeating Starscourge Radahn.

name: Steel-Wire Torch
description: Torch. Found on a corpse at the end of a narrow path at the top level of the castle. Guarded by two harpies.

name: Stillwater Cave
description: A dark and murky water, poisonous cave. Infested with Giant Bats and large Poison Flowers.

name: Stillwater Cave
description: Site of Grace inside Stillwater Cave close to the entrance.

name: Stonedigger Troll
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of Limgrave Tunnels. Drops Roar Medallion

name: Stonedigger Troll
description: Optional Boss encountered in the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon. Drops the Great Club weapon upon defeat.

name: Stonesward Key
description: Found in Raya Lucaria through an Illusory Wall just before the Site of Grace at Debate Parlor.

name: Stonesword Key (B)
description: Stoneword Key Found on the ground by a wooden barricade at the southern end of the Bridge of Sacrifice.

name: Stonesword Key (D)
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse sitting in a chair at the northern edge of the plateau, overlooking the sea.

name: Stonesword Key (P)
description: At Auriza Hero's Grave, one can be found while passing the third part of the giant chariots, on a small platform in the middle.

name: Stonesword Key - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse partially hanging from a wooden platform. The platform can be found by walking down west from the nearby Site of Grace and back onto a section of the castle. Look to the left edge.

name: Stonesword Key A
description: Stoneword Key Found inside a small room, protected by a Rat.

name: Stonesword Key C
description: Stoneword Key found at Stormhill Shack next to the Site of Grace.

name: Stonesword Key F
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse inside a building section with a broken roof. Accessed from the very top of the Rampart Tower with careful platforming.

name: Stonesword Key G
description: Found inside the Academy Crystal Cave. Head to the left to where the Sages are, and enter the next room. You will find it inside a cage.

name: Stonesword Key H
description: Stonesword Key found on a corpse on a broken bridge.

name: Stonesword Key I
description: Found on a body sitting on a chair

name: Stonesword Key J
description: Looted on a fountain, center of the academy's courtyard.

name: Stonesword Key K
description: Key Item. Found under a large burnt tree near the cliffs.

name: Stonesword Key L
description: Found at the end of the third secret area in Sealed Tunnel.

name: Stonesword Key M
description: Found on a body on a stone ledge, reached by traversing the rocks leading from the wall all the way to the ledge. A set of slugs can be found underneath looking at the body

name: Stonesword Key N
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse on a ledge on the outside of the tower. Accessible via careful platforming.

name: Stonesword Key O
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse sitting high above on a ledge connecting two buildings. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Stonesword Key Q
description: Found in front of a grave, there are three enemies in the vicinity

name: Stonesword Key R
description: Found in the lower platform, open a door and find it inside the chest.

name: Stonesword Key S
description: At the corner near the cliff on a dead body.

name: Stormcaller Church
description: A small church located on a steppe. There is a Sacred Tear inside.

name: Stormfoot Catacombs
description: A deep catacomb littered with fire traps and creatures.

name: Stormgate
Stormhawk Axe
description: 2x Found under the bridge leading from the swamp up to Village of the Albinaurics.

name: Stormhawk Deenh
description: Spirit Ash. Found in a chest on the wooden walkway above the southern wing's main room. Accessible from where The Stormhawk King key item is found.

name: Stormhill Evergaol
description: Stormhill Evergaol is a round platform that can be easily found at the west of Stormhill.

name: Stormhill Shack
description: An important quest starts here! Make sure to visit to unlock Spirit Ash upgrades.

name: Stormhill Shack
description: Site of Grace found right next to Stormhill Shack..

name: Stormveil Castle
description: The first Legacy Dungeon of Elden Ring. Recommended level 30+ and Weapons +4. The stronghold of Godrick the Grafted. Other Bosses include Many Armed Key Master and Lion Guardian.

name: Stormveil Cliffside
description: Site of Grace found on the cliffs outside the castle walls in the southwest. There is a Summoning Pool nearby.

name: Stormveil Main Gate
description: Site of Grace found right by the castle's southern gate.

name: Stranded Graveyard
description: Site of Grace found inside the Stranded Graveyard, just before the lift leading outside to The First Step.

name: Street of Sages Ruins
description: Ruins with lots of poison flowers and poison casters. You can pick up Rock Sling Sorcery as well as the Meteorite Staff here.

name: Strength-Knot Crystal Tear
description: Physick Flask Matrial. Found inside a stone receptacle near the edge of the cliffs.

name: String
description: Dropped by killed Demi-Humans during an ambush.

name: String - x4 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: On the sewers, at the big room with rats, can be found on a body against a wall.

name: Strip of White Flesh
description: Found on a dead body, sitting across a Soldier.

name: Strip of White Flesh
description: Can be found in the back of the bridge. Beware of the Infested pods lurking there.

name: Study Hall Entrance
description: Site of Grace that can be found just inside the entrance.

name: Study Hall Entrance
description: Site of Grace found at the entrance of the Carian Study Hall.

name: Subterranean Inquisition Chamber
description: Site of grace surrounded by magma

name: Summonwater Village
description: The flooded remains of a dilapidated village. Here you will find the Tibia Mariner boss.

name: Sword of Night and Flame
description: Straight Sword. Found in a chest inside a locked room behind the gardens. This is accessible by using the walkways above. You can get onto the walkways from the Chapel building in the west.

name: Sword of St. Trina
description: Found inside a chest in the underground cellar of the Forsaken Ruins.

name: Tailoring Tools
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Demi-Human Chief boss upon defeat.

name: Talisman Pouch
description: Small, withered bag, knitted by hand. Bestowed upon the ruling lord, or those atempting to become lord, by the elderly Finger Reader. Dropped by Margit, the Fell Omen upon defeat.

name: Tanith
description: Tanith, head of Volcano Manor.

name: Teleporter Chest
description: Teleporter Chest. Found atop the Tower of Return. Transports you to Leyndell, Royal Capital upon opening.

name: Tempest-Facing Balcony
description: The main door of the hall leaves to the balcony that faces the tornados in the center, and the site of grace is right there in the middle of the balcony.

name: Temple Quarter
description: Located at the Southwestern of the Raya Lucaria Academy, the Temple Quarter isn't what it used to be in its glory.

name: Terra Magicus
description: Sorcery. Found at the top of a tower in the middle of the Raya Lucaria Academy. This area is accessed by completing the Academy Crystal Cave dungeon and taking the lift behind the boss' door.

name: Testu's Rise
description: Lookout Tower. Initially sealed by a barrier. Inspecting the statue at the entrance, you are asked to "seek three wise beasts". These can be found as Ghostly Tortoises. Skeletal Spirits will also appear all over the isle, attempting to hinder your progress. The first Tortoise can be found by the cliffs north of the tower. The second one can be found in the south, below the cliffs. The last one can be found high up on one of the trees east of the tower. Once all three have been defeated, the tower's seal is broken.

name: Thawfrost Boluses
description: Consumable. Found in a corpse hiding from a cliff behind an enemy.

name: Thawfrost Boluses - 4x Castle Sol
description: Consumable. 3x found on a corpse in an area between two buildings accessed via the wooden walkways in the courtyard. One more is found on a corpse hanging by a wall outside the Church.

name: The First Step
description: Site of Grace found just outside the Stranded Graveyard, named The First Step.

name: The Flame of Frenzy
description: Incantation. Found on a corpse by one of the pillars on the left side of the Callu Baptismal Church.

name: The Four Belfries
description: Site of Grace by The Four Belfries.

name: The Four Belfries
description: A hub for transporter waygates that lead to various locations. Each waygate requires an Imbued Sword Key to activate.

name: The Shaded Castle
description: An abandoned and Decrepit castle found in the northern region between the Mt. Gelmir and the Altus Plateau regions. The castle is half sunken into a poisonous bog, with the air tinged yellow by the fumes.

name: The Stormhawk King
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse in the southern wing of the chapel, up on the roof.

name: Third Church of Marika
description: The Ruins of an Old Church found in the Mistwood. The most prominent sight here is a statue of a lady with her arms outstretched.

name: Third Church of Marika
description: Site of Grace located at Third Church of Marika, an antique building in ruins featuring a large statue of a woman with her arms wide open.

name: Thops
description: Tops is a former student of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Teaches basic Sorceries, and will move if you give him a Glintstone Academy Key.

name: Thops (Deceased)
description: If you give him the Academy Glintstone Key that you find in Raya Lucaria Academy, you'll find him dead, sitting in a chair, outside the Schoolhouse Classroom Site. You can loot the following from his body: Thops's Bell Bearing, Academy Glintstone Staff, and Thops's Barrier.

name: Throwing Dagger x8 - Castle Morne
description: Held by a corpse across the wooden bridge that's in front of Raumpart Gaol at Castle Morne.

name: Tibia Mariner (A)
description: Optional Boss. Found riding its boat in the flooded areas of Summonwater Village. Defeat it to progress D's questline.

name: Tibia Mariner (B)
description: One of the locations where Tibia Mariner Boss appears.

name: Tibia Mariner C
description: Found in the waterlogged section of Wyndham Ruins. Drops A Deathroot and Tibia's Summons

name: Tibia's Summons
description: Drops from the Tibia Mariner at Wyndham Ruins.

name: Tombsward
description: Site of Grace found west of the Minor Erdtree, at the base of the plateau.

name: Tombsward Catacombs
description: A hidden mini-dungeon. The entrance can be found behind a leaning pillar on the side of the mountain.

name: Tombsward Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found inside the Tombsward Catacombs, a few steps from the entrance.

name: Tombsward Cave
description: Tombsward Cave is an optional dungeon in Elden Ring. You'll come across a poisonous swamp once you reach deeper within the cave.

name: Tombsward Cave (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace can be found once you enter the Tombsward Cave.

name: Tombsward Ruins
description: Short description for xx location

name: Tower of Return
description: Dilapidated tower found near the edge of the landmass. Beware the mounted knight and foot soldiers nearby. There is a Transporter Chest at the very top.

name: Traveler Set
description: Set includes: Traveler's Hat, Perfumer's Traveling Garb, Traveler's Gloves, Traveler's Slops, can be found on a corpse in a corner in the ruins.

name: Traveling Maiden Set
description: Armor set comprised of the Traveling Maiden Hood, Traveling Maiden Robe, Traveling Maiden Gloves and the Traveling Maiden Boots. Found inside the Shack of the Lofty.

name: Tree Sentinel
description: Optional Boss. Found guarding the western gate to Leyndell.

name: Tree Sentinel (A)
description: Mini boss roaming the area. Drops Golden Halberd

name: Treespear
description: Found on the Caravan left at the edge of the collapsed bridge.

name: Trina's Lily
description: x3 Trina's Lily under the giant ruined structure. Beware of the Giant Crab guarding them.

name: Trina's Lily
description: Drop down the Site of Grace to the lower platform, you will find it being guarded by a white wolf.

name: Triumphant Delight
description: Gesture. Obtained as you push Alexander out of the ground he's stuck in.

name: Troll Hammer
description: Hammer Weapon. Found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.

name: Troll Knight's Sword
description: Dropped by a Troll Knight.

name: Twiggy Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar at the base of the Minor Erdtree in Capital Outskirts. Guarded by enemies.

name: Twinblade
description: Underground. Can be found once you take the stairs down Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Twinblade Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in the tower section of the walls of Castle Morne. Climb up the ladder and go around the tower to find a chest containing the talisman.

name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
description: Drops from a Crystallized Crab once killed. You'll find it outside the second-floor balcony, east section of the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy. It's hiding by the corner of the scaffolding.

name: Twinsage Sorcerer Ashes
description: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade boss of the Black Knife Catacombs

name: Two Fingers Heirloom
description: Can be found on the lower level of the Putrified Ruins. It is on the chest in front of you as you descend.

name: Two Fingers' Prayerbook
description: Located in the first floor of Fortified Manor.

name: Uchigatana
description: Found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. It is in a body, hanging from the upper platform. You need to use the lever in order to reach that room. Beware of the Skeleton Archers.

name: Ulcerated Tree Spirit
description: Boss roaming Mt. Gelmir. Drops Leaden Hardtear and Cerulean Hidden Tear

name: Ulcerated Tree Spirit A
description: Ulcerated Tree Spirit is found underneath the Stranded Graveyard within Fringefolk Hero's Grave. Defeating it drops Banished Knight Oleg's Ashes.

name: Unalloyed Gold Needle
description: Key Quest Item. Required to progress Gowry's questline. Dropped by Commander O'Neil upon defeat.

name: Unseen Blade
description: Found at the top of Mirage Rise. Can be found alongside Unseen Form

name: Unseen Form
description: Found at the top of Mirage Rise. Can be found alongside Unseen Blade

name: Unsightly Catacombs
description: A burial grounds crawling with Misbegotten creatures found deep beneath the Perfumer's Ruins. Despite its decrepit state, the catacombs give off a trace of fragrant aromas juxtaposed by the scent of the ancient dead.

name: Unsightly Catacombs
description: Site of Grace near the Unsightly Catacombs entrance.

name: Upper-Class Robe
description: Found at the end of tha passageway. Beware of the Bedouin on your left side.

name: Valkyrie's Prosthesis
description: Found in a chest in the room guarded by a single Cleanrot Knight on the North Western edge of The Shaded Castle

name: Veteran's Prosthesis
description: Fist Weapon. Dropped by Commander Niall upon defeat.

name: Village of the Albinaurics
description: An abandoned Village

name: Village of the Albinaurics (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace for the Village of Albinaurics

name: Viridian Amber Medallion
description: Viridian Amber Medallion Raises maximum stamina. It is dropped by Miranda the Blighted Bloom, found inside the Tombsward Cave.

name: Visage Shield
description: Greatshield. Found in a chest in a small room behind the Mad Pumpkin Head duo bosses. Accessible after defeating them.

name: Volcano Cave
description: A cave found at the top of a mountain.

name: Volcano Cave
description: Site of Grace located by the entrance to Volcano Cave.

name: Volcano Manor
description: The manor of a lord looking to rebel against the Erdtree.

name: Volcano Manor (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace located just inside the Volcano Manor.

name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
description: Dropped by an enemy in the same group that also drops Vulgar Militia Helm

name: Vulgar Militia Helm
description: Dropped by an enemy located in a small group, near a big tree.

name: Wandering Noble Ashes
description: Found inside a catacomb at the end of the dungeon.

name: Warmaster's Shack
description: Small shack in a remote place of Stormhill.

name: Warmaster's Shack
description: Site of grace in Warmaster's Shack.

name: Warming Stone
description: Consumable Item. 2 can be found on a corpse atop the eastern-most tower of the Castle Morne Ramparts. This area can be reached by using Torrent to jump from the Spiritspring located just east of the Site of Grace nearby.

name: Warming Stone (Church of Irith Graveyard)
description: Consumable. 3x Warming Stone on a graveyard protected by several undead.

name: Warming Stone (Fort Gael)
description: Looted off a corpse that's hanging on a narrow beam. Bacony/Upper-section of Fort Gael.

name: Warming Stone (Mountaintops of the Giants)
description: 2 Warming Stones found on a body in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Warpick
description: Looted from one of the many Undead Soldiers.

name: Waygate (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Waygate. Teleports you across the ravine to the northern side of the river.

name: Waygate to Liurnia East (from Liurnia West)
description: Waygate teleports players to the western side of Liurnia of the Lakes, by the Northern Liurnia Lakeshore Site of Grace

name: Waygate to Mohgwyn Palace
description: Waygate. Teleports players to the underground area beneath Caelid, called Mohgwyn Palace

name: Waypoint Ruins
description: Waypoint Ruins consists of a group of broken buildings and abandoned campsites, now overrun with poisonous flowers and their crazed caretaker.

name: Waypoint Ruins Cellar
description: Site of grace in the cellar of the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Weeping Evergaol
description: Evergaol imprisoning the Ancient Hero of Zamor boss. Requires a Stonesword Key to unlock the portal mechanism.

name: West Capital Rampart
description: Site of grace

name: Whetstone Knife
description: Key Item. Found in the southeastern area of Gatefront Ruins. There is a set of stairs that leads to a small room with a treasure chest. This item is found alongside the Ash of War: Storm Stomp upgrade.

name: Whip
description: Whip. Found on a corpse inside the building known as the Rampart Gaol. This building is first accessed by walking atop the western wall of the castle. Look to the left for a building with a blue roof. Jump onto this roof and then jump down to the cliffs below. Follow the cliffs southeast until you return to a section of the castle with a big square opening. Descend into the opening by landing on the wooden beams. There is a corpse with a Smithing Stone [2] on one of the beams and there are several Rats and a Harpy at the ground level. The corpse with the whip is sitting against a wall.
